articles.title: Hidden underground, in shining fool's gold, signs of life from millions of years ago - USA TODAY
articles.description: The discovery represents a new species of arthropod, a category of animals that includes spiders and insects.
articles.content:
All that glitters is not gold.
But in the world of fossil discovery, a golden glitter is plenty of cause for celebration even if it's not real.
